comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: No Wikipedia article. Wall Street Journal - Aug 13, 1914. Washington: The Senate confirmed the nominations of Victor B Woolley of Wilmington Del to be United States Circuit Judge for the Third Circuit.

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks for the info trialsanderrors. We will fix the spelling of his last name.

comment.author: 10799299@N00
comment._content: He is most well known in Delaware today as the author of "Practice in Civil Actions and Proceedings in the Law Courts of the State of Delaware," which is still used in Delaware and is commonly known as "Woolley on Delaware Practice" or just "Woolley."
